title: Sending traces, logs, and metrics to the Collector
subtitle: Configuring applications to send telemetry data with and without sidecar injection

abstract.para: This document describes how to send traces, logs, and metrics from applications to the OpenTelemetry Collector or TempoStack instance. Learn about two deployment approaches: using sidecar injection for automatic configuration, and manual configuration without sidecars. Includes procedures for setting up service accounts, configuring RBAC permissions, deploying the Collector in different modes, and configuring environment variables for telemetry data export.
